title: #51: Gary Vaynerchuk aka Gary Vee: Legacy, Influencer Marketing, College & Controlling Your Destiny
itunes:title: #51: Gary Vaynerchuk aka Gary Vee: Legacy, Influencer Marketing, College & Controlling Your Destiny
description:
On this episode we are joined by Gary Vaynerchuk aka Gary Vee (@garyvee) Gary is the CEO and Founder of Vayner Media, he is a serial entreprenuer and influencer. Gary is also an investor in Twitter, Tumblr, Uber, and Snapchat. Gary sits down with us to discuss legacy, college for entrepreneurs, influencer marketing and not getting stuck at the mercy of social networks. This episode is all about putting as much as you can within your control and not relying on platforms to build your empire!

To connect with Gary click HERE

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential Bombshell Body Guide and Meal plan. 

tired of combating inflammation & bloat? Want to feel lighter and sexier?

Check out lauryn’s latest 7 day meal plan.

In this simple & super effective plan you’ll find:

+ tsc grocery list with every ingredient you need for the 7 days.

+ what the f*ck to do when you love carbs guide.

+ quick and delicious recipes: breakfast, snacks, lunch, dinner and dessert.

You will also find 28 weeks worth of fat burning, muscle toning, 27 minute long, effective workouts you can do at home with no equipment.

USE PROMO CODE: HIMANDHER at Checkout for 20% Off
